DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Asia . This study prospective , open , uncontrolled , observational surveillance study Levemir® FlexPen® conduct Korea . The aim observational study evaluate short term long term safety efficacy Levemir® FlexPen® . The study plan conduct per requirement Korea Food Drug Administration ( KFDA ) .
